reviews.text: Stayed at the Ramada Inn with the family for one night. Room was inexpensive, basic, and clean. Free high speed internet, a nice looking pool area but a below par restaurant (dirty, out of some menu items, etc). Paid half price since we were visiting family over the holiday, not sure I would pay full price. For a basic roadside motel, not a bad option.
reviews.title: Ok at half price

reviews.text: This hotel lies amidst busy local highways but, as long as you have a poolside room, no traffic noises at all.
reviews.title: Highway peace
Overbooked - with guaranteed room
reviews.text: Staff is helpful but slow and somewhat disorganized.
